item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, join me and others in a little Blues, Bluegrass, Folk & Americana Music! This series has become a popular tradition among music lovers to end the weekend on a Sunday afternoon in an idyllic garden setting. The impressive lineup of regional touring bands brings talent recognized nationally who have performed at Carnegie Hall, The Kennedy Center, National Public Radioâ€™s "Mountain Stage," the famed Philadelphia Folk Festival and other widely acclaimed venues across the country. These concerts are family affairs in an idyllic garden setting where people can choose to sit in the enclosed 'beer garden' with tables, or bring their own lawn blankets or chairs and enjoy the concert up close.

Here is what is playing for the next couple of Sunday evenings.

Sun., Aug. 22 Hank& Dixie & the Knotty Pine Boys
Fantastic blend of Country Western.
http://www.joyscream....


Sun., Aug 29 Sweet Wednesday
Singing Storytellers that'll make you laugh and cry
http://sweetwednesday...

Sun., Sept. 12 Hey Mama
Sexy roots swagger with populist fire
http://heymamamusic.c...

Sun., Sept 19 Taylor River Band
Fast playing, harmonious Bluegrass
http://taylorriverban...

Sun., Sept. 26 Kate Redgate
Acoustic driven blues, folk, country & rock
http://www.myspace.co...


Look for me in the garden, I should be there around 4 or 5pm, If I'm not there early just come sit and enjoy or look for other Trailblazers. Call me if you get lost at:603-312-6735. See you there! Peter

For more info on the Governors Inn check them out at: info@governorsinn.com

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: The Sunday Garden Concerts
